content.question: Which of the following statements about the power series <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 0, to infinity, of, n factorial times x raised to the 2 n power " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>!</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is true?

choices.label: The series does not converge for any real number <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The series converges for <math alttext="x equals 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only.

The series converges on the interval <math alttext="negative 1 is less than x, which is less than 1 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only.
The series converges for all real numbers <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The series converges for <math alttext="x equals 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> only.
